column4: I can use IRC but my web browser, BitTorrent, etc can't connect to the network. How can I find out what is going on?
Can anyone hear me? I'm having network troubles. I can see the messages coming through, can you see mine?
no
have you tried other browsers?
Firefox doesn't work, ping doesn't work, telnet doesn't work.
on what port?
on port 80?
Port 80.
can telnet into your smtp server on 25?
Although as you can see IRC works just fine somehow.
Would that just be "telnet localhost 25"?
you dont have other smtp servers?
does another computer in your network work fine?
I can connect to other computers on my network.
I don't know if those computers can get the internets.
do you have a webserver on your network?
I have a webserver running on this very machine and can't connect to it.
what does netstat -tuap say?
It says a lot, what should I be looking for?
just making sure it is making connections
There is no reason it should have any use. =P
